item.title: 西班牙任命因陀罗-投资者接替党内忠诚人士担任主席
item.description: 西班牙任命 Indra Sistemas SA 的主要投资者之一领导该国最大的国防公司，接替社会党忠实成员的职位。【原文：Spain named one of Indra Sistemas SA’s main investors to lead the country’s largest defense company, replacing a Socialist party loyalist in the role.】

item.title: 微软首席执行官支持的 Groww 选择银行在印度上市，估值高达 80 亿美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，Billionbrains Garage Ventures Pvt.【原文：Billionbrains Garage Ventures Pvt. Ltd. has picked banks including JPMorgan Chase & Co. and Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. for a potential Mumbai initial public offering, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Investcorp 可能在未来几年寻求 IPO 和战略投资者
item.description: 中东最大的另类资产管理公司 Investcorp 执行主席穆罕默德-阿拉迪（Mohammed Alardhi）表示，该公司可能考虑在未来几年内与战略投资者达成交易或首次公开募股。【原文：Investcorp, the Middle East’s largest alternative asset manager, could look at a deal with a strategic investor or an initial public offering in the next few years, according to executive chairman Mohammed Alardhi.】

item.title: 安宏即将斥资 11 亿美元收购银科中国部门
item.description: 据知情人士透露，收购公司 Advent 正在接近完成对银库国际中国大陆业务的收购，银库国际是由 EQT AB 支持的隐形眼镜制造商。【原文：Buyout firm Advent is closing in on an acquisition of the mainland Chinese operations of Ginko International, the contact lens maker backed by EQT AB, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 比特币在美国特朗普就职典礼前再创新高
item.description: 在美国准备为支持加密货币的当选总统唐纳德-特朗普举行就职典礼之际，比特币创下了 109,241 美元的历史新高。【原文：Bitcoin reached an all-time high of $109,241 as the US prepares to inaugurate pro-crypto President-elect Donald Trump.】

item.title: 英国最新财报不佳，国内股市反弹希望渺茫
item.description: 英国富时 100 指数可能创下历史新高，但工党政府预算案的影响正在一系列疲软的最新交易中显现出来，痛苦可能集中在国内股票上。【原文：The UK’s FTSE 100 Index may be at an all-time high, but the fallout from the Labour government’s budget is showing up in a slew of weak trading updates with the pain likely to be concentrated in domestic stocks.】

item.title: 免费午餐和退税使普拉博沃的支持率飙升至创纪录的 81
item.description: 印尼总统普拉博沃-苏比安托的民望在其上任后的 100 天内达到了一个里程碑，超过了其前任的支持率，创下了新政府的最高得分。【原文：Indonesian President Prabowo Subianto’s popularity hit a milestone within his first 100 days in office, surpassing his predecessor’s rating and marking the highest score for a new administration.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将从纪录回落，英镑上涨
欧洲央行 1 月降息并非板上钉钉：霍尔茨曼
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）在接受 Politico 采访时重复了早些时候关于下周会议可能投票的言论，称 "对我来说，欧洲央行 1 月份降息根本不是板上钉钉的事"。【原文：A January rate cut by the European Central Bank is “not a foregone conclusion for me at all,” Governing Council member Robert Holzmann told Politico in an interview, repeating earlier remarks on the likely vote at next week’s meeting.】

item.title: 加密货币在特朗普就职之际推出 Memecoin
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普和他的妻子梅拉尼娅（Melania）新发行的memecoins引发了加密货币高管的批评，他们本以为共和党即将上任的美国政府会认真对待数字资产行业。【原文：Donald Trump and his wife Melania’s new memecoins ignited criticism from crypto executives who were expecting the digital-asset sector to be treated seriously by the Republican’s incoming US administration.】

item.title: 越南计划减税降费吸引海外投资者
item.description: 越南当局正计划进行一系列改革，吸引更多海外投资者进入股市，以确保这个东南亚增长最快的经济体有足够的资本流入。【原文：Vietnam’s authorities are planning a series of reforms to lure more overseas investors to the stock market in an effort to ensure Southeast Asia’s fastest-growing economy has enough capital inflows.】

item.title: 分析师上调评级，科塔克股价飙升，资产质量保持稳定
item.description: 科塔克-马恒达银行有限公司（Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd. ）公布的第三季度新增不良贷款下降，引发分析师上调其评级，该公司股价因此大涨。【原文：Kotak Mahindra Bank Ltd.’s shares jumped as the lender reported a decline in new bad loans in the third quarter, triggering analyst upgrades.】

item.title: 美元在特朗普就职典礼前几个小时的清淡交易中下滑
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）第二次就任美国总统的几个小时前，交易员们削减了普遍看好美元的头寸，美元兑大多数主要货币走低。【原文：The dollar inched lower against most major currencies as traders trimmed widely-favored bullish positions on the greenback just hours ahead of Donald Trump’s second inauguration as the US President.】

item.title: 坦桑尼亚执政党 CCM 提名哈桑总统连任
item.description: 坦桑尼亚执政党查马查-马宾杜兹党提名萨米亚-苏卢胡-哈桑（Samia Suluhu Hassan）总统为其选举候选人，预计该党将扩大对这个天然气资源丰富的东非国家的权力控制。【原文：Tanzania’s ruling Chama Cha Mapinduzi party named President Samia Suluhu Hassan as its candidate for elections that are expected to extend its grip on power in the gas-rich East African nation.】

item.title: 监管机构打击后，Paytm 第四季度销售额下滑
item.description: Paytm 的销售额连续第四个季度下滑，因为这家印度金融科技公司正努力摆脱一年前监管限制的阴影，监管限制对其大部分业务造成了损害。【原文：Paytm’s sales slid for the fourth consecutive quarter as the Indian fintech pushes hard to emerge from the shadow of regulatory curbs a year ago that hurt much of its business.】

item.title: 开发商困境加剧，中国加强对万科的干预
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，在流动性压力加深以及围绕中国万科集团（China Vanke Co.【原文：Chinese officials are taking steps to stabilize operations at China Vanke Co. after deepening liquidity stress and questions surrounding the whereabouts of its top executive triggered turmoil for its bonds and shares last week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 桑切斯为投资者带来西班牙商业干预的惊喜
item.description: 上任六年后，西班牙首相佩德罗-桑切斯（Pedro Sanchez）在这个欧元区最成功的主要经济体中的政策出人意料，让企业高管和投资者大跌眼镜。【原文：After six years in office, Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez is blindsiding executives and investors with policy surprises in the euro area’s most successful major economy.】

item.title: F1 名将罗斯伯格支持一家人工智能初创公司让 "愚蠢 "的机器人变聪明
item.description: Sereact 是一家为机器人制造人工智能软件的德国初创公司，该公司已筹集到 2500 万欧元（约合 2570 万美元）的资金，以寻求将其技术应用于物流和制造以外领域的方法。【原文：Sereact, a German startup that makes AI software for robots, has raised €25 million ($25.7 million) to find ways to apply its technology to areas beyond logistics and manufacturing.】

item.title: 2025 年马来西亚股市有望因利润增长而上涨 10%以上
item.description: 由于国有企业的投资提高了收益，马来西亚股市可能会实现十多年来首次连续年度上涨。【原文：Malaysian stocks may notch their first back-to-back annual gain in more than a decade as investments by state-owned firms boost earnings.】

item.title: 中国太阳能股票在 2024 年初步业绩黯淡后下跌
item.description: 周一，中国三大太阳能公司的股价下滑，因为它们公布了 2024 年的初步业绩。【原文：Share prices of three major Chinese solar companies slipped on Monday, after they announced gloomy preliminary results for 2024.】

item.title: MA Financial 为上市私人信贷基金融资 1.06 亿美元
item.description: 澳大利亚上市基金管理公司 MA 金融集团有限公司为其首个上市投资信托基金筹集了 1.71 亿澳元（1.06 亿美元）的基石资金。【原文：MA Financial Group Ltd., an Australian-listed fund manager, has raised A$171 million ($106 million) in cornerstone capital for its first listed investment trust.】

item.title: 印度科技界 "特朗普热潮 "减退，成果不温不火
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 中国苏打水生产商大姚据称考虑 5 亿美元香港 IPO
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，中国苏打水生产商大姚正在为最早于 2025 年下半年在香港首次公开募股做准备，这将推动香港新股上市的复苏。【原文：Chinese soda maker Dayao is gearing up for a Hong Kong initial public offering as early as the second half of 2025, people familiar with the matter said, building on the city’s emerging recovery in new listings.】

item.title: 印尼向全球投资者开放碳市场以提升需求
item.description: 印度尼西亚的国内碳交易所向外国参与者开放交易，因为该国的目标是恢复其作为主要抵消中心的地位，并为当地的气候行动吸引更多投资。【原文：Indonesia’s domestic carbon exchange opened trading to foreign participants as the nation aims to restore its position as a major hub for offsets and attract more investment for local climate action.】

item.title: 养老基金支持部分首席执行官提议，韩国锌业股价大涨
item.description: 韩国最大的养老基金同意在本周的特别股东大会上投票支持首席执行官 Yun B. Choi 提出的一些建议后，韩国锌业公司（Korea Zinc Co.【原文：Shares in Korea Zinc Co. jumped as much as 10% on Monday after the nation’s biggest pension fund agreed to vote in favor of some proposals put forward by Chief Executive Officer Yun B. Choi at this week’s special shareholders meeting.】

item.title: 需求下降，中国钢铁企业面临更多减产
item.description: 中国的钢铁产量仍然过高，随着国内消费下降和无利可图的钢厂达到临界点，钢铁行业将面临更多痛苦。【原文：China is still producing too much steel, setting up the industry for more pain as domestic consumption drops and unprofitable mills reach a tipping point.】

item.title: 泰国开始物色具有 "现代理念 "的央行行长
item.description: 在现任央行行长坎坷的任期即将结束之际，泰国已开始寻找一位具有 "现代理念"、能与国家密切合作的新央行行长。【原文：Thailand has started the search for a new central bank governor with “modern ideas” who can work closely with the state, as the incumbent’s rocky tenure nears its end.】

item.title: 英国房价开年创 20 个月最大涨幅
item.description: Rightmove 的数据显示，2025 年初，英国住宅的要价创下了一年半以来的最大涨幅，这表明人们对房地产市场充满信心。【原文：Asking prices for UK homes jumped by the most in over one-and-a-half years at the start of 2025, a sign of resilient confidence in the property market, according to Rightmove.】

item.title: 英国立法者警告里夫斯的成本节约行动可能落空
item.description: 英国立法者对财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）削减浪费开支的计划提出了质疑，并警告说，新成立的效率部门人手不足，几乎没有时间完成任务。【原文：UK lawmakers have raised doubts over Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves’ plan to cut down on wasteful spending, warning that a new efficiencies unit is understaffed and has little time to achieve its mandate.】

item.title: 石油稳定在 81 美元附近，市场为特朗普上台做好准备
item.description: 在当选总统唐纳德-特朗普就职典礼之前，石油市场保持稳定，因为市场已经做好准备，迎接他在白宫第二个任期开始时的一段不确定和动荡时期。【原文：Oil was steady ahead of the inauguration of President-elect Donald Trump, as the market braced for a period of uncertainty and turmoil at the start of his second term in the White House.】
